item.title: Pavement covered with leaves, 15th October
item.description:

item.title: Bike abandoned outside 63 Elderfield Road, 15th October

item.title: Street light by Cundy Quarter hoarding in Mozart Terrace/ Ebury street, 15th October
item.description:
Several amenity society members have been in touch with the BRA telling us this light has been out of order for some time now. Please be so kind as to remedy James Wright Chairman Belgravia Residents Association

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 96, Eaton Terrace, Belgravia, London

item.title: Overgrown bush blocking pavement and one way sign on the road, 15th October
item.description:
